Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48623 affecting package perl-Cpanel-JSON-XS for versions less than 4.39-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-48623 affecting package perl-Cpanel-JSON-XS for versions less than 4.39-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package perl-Cpanel-JSON-XS is earlier than 4.39-1, affected by CVE-2022-48623
